File_menu module¶

Module wich contains the FileMenu class and some functions linked to this menu

Classes:

FileMenu(frame)

Inits a instance of a wx.Menu to create a File menu and his buttons

Styled_Editor(parent, topwindow, text, on_card)

Customizable Editor page

Functions:

my_speak(frame, txt)

Speak the texte given in params by creating a thread dedicated

save_on_card(frame, page)

Save the tab on the device connected
class File_menu.FileMenu(frame)¶

Bases: wx._core.Menu

Inits a instance of a wx.Menu to create a File menu and his buttons

(Copy, Paste, Find,…)

Returns

the File menu filled by buttons

Return type

wx.Menu see https://wxpython.org/Phoenix/docs/html/wx.Menu.html

Methods:

OnAddPage(evt)

Add a new page on the notebook

OnClosePage(evt)

Close the current page and update id order

OnExit(evt)

Quit the app

OnOpen(evt)

Open a wx.filedialog to open a file on a editor

OnSave(evt)

Save the current page of the notebook

OnSaveAs(evt)

Open a wx.filedialog to Save as a file the text of the current editor
